meanings.definition: The state of being without sin.
meanings.sent1: Her sinlessness was admired by all who knew her.
meanings.sent2: The monk's sinlessness was evident in his pure actions.
meanings.sent3: Despite his mischievous nature, his sinlessness in this matter surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The sinlessness of the newborn baby brought joy to the whole family.
meanings.sent5: The sinlessness of the snow-covered landscape was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The quality of being free from sin.
meanings.sent1: The sinlessness of her heart shone through in her kind deeds.
meanings.sent2: His sinlessness was a source of inspiration for others striving for purity.
meanings.sent3: The cat's sinlessness in knocking over the vase was met with suspicion by the dog.
meanings.sent4: The sinlessness of the clear sky after the storm was a welcome sight.
meanings.sent5: The sinlessness of the crystal-clear water was a testament to its purity.
